problem_text_cn: 如下图,D是△ABC的边BC的中点,且\frac{AE}{BE}=\frac{1}{3},求\frac{AF}{FC}的值()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure below, D is the midpoint of the edge BC of △ABC, and \frac {AE}{BE} =\frac{N_0}{N_1}, find the value of \frac {AF}{FC}()
raw_answer: 解:如图,过点A作AG∥BC交DE于点G；则△EAG∽△EBD,△AGF∽△CDF,∴\frac{AG}{BD}=\frac{AE}{BE}=\frac{1}{3},\frac{AF}{FC}=\frac{AG}{DC},∵BD=DC,∴\frac{AF}{FC}=\frac{AG}{BD}=\frac{1}{3},故选:B．
raw_comment: 该命题主要考查了平行线分线段成比例定理及其应用问题；解题的关键是作辅助线构造相似三角形,借助相似三角形的性质来分析、判断、推理或解答．
